attributes.action: Stop the closure of the best nightclub in the land (XandY)
attributes.additional_details: It is things exactly like this which are disengaging so many of the youth of today from contemporary day society and this will no doubt leave an in repairable fracture in the ever vibrant Oakham nightlife culture. The after effects this will send through our small community are quite simply unimaginable and we are not at all prepared to handle this.
attributes.background: XY Bottle Bar in Oakham is shutting down meaning there will be nowhere to go for a mad one on an Oakham Thursday night.
